title: SAVE_RESOURCE_FILE
content:
0xA09E7E7B// SaveResourceFile
BOOL SAVE_RESOURCE_FILE(char* resourceName, char* fileName, char* data, int dataLength);Parameters:resourceName: The name of the resource.fileName: The name of the file.data: The data to write to the file.dataLength: The length of the written data.Returns: A value indicating if the write succeeded.Writes the specified data to a file in the specified resource.
Using a length of -1 will automatically detect the length assuming the data is a C string.
codeBlocks:
// SaveResourceFile
BOOL SAVE_RESOURCE_FILE(char* resourceName, char* fileName, char* data, int dataLength);
